content:
<CarlBeek> RollCall #8 in ~17.5 hours:

- @wilsoncusack from Base will be presenting RIP-7755 on Cross-L2 calls.
- Updates on the L1 Pectra hard-fork
- Announcement of a breakout on the future of the EVM on L2


Info:

- October 9, 14:00 UTC
- Zoom link posted here just before the call
